original_text: And it came to pass in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, that this word came unto Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,
korean_text: 유다의 요시야 왕의 아들 여호야김 제사년에 여호와께로부터 예레미야에게 말씀이 임하니라 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in the fourth year
of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah
that this word came unto Jeremiah
